description: This container is made from thick leather with a cap sewn on tight and fitted with a ripcord. Pulling the cord rips open the flask and activates the alchemi cal substance within. The flask emits a high-pitched shriek in a 15-foot cone. Anything in the cone takes ld8 points of sonic damage and is deafened for 1 minute (Fortitude DC 15 negates).
name: Screaming Flask

description: to all points west. For a reasonable sum (the entire allowance Your lordship, I hope this missive finds you, the illustrious you’ve afforded me, plus a bit more), I’ve made a deposit toward lady Siekes, your noble heirs, your impressive holdings in Saerb, purchasing this bottleneck on all trade in the region. and your vast portfolio well and more than well. With your indul- My new compatriot did ask me to relay a strange bit of gence, as your dutifully attentive and personally appointed agent “advice” to you, though—as if such a scallywag had any means to your southern claims, I have news of interest to report. to instruct upon my lordship. His words were: “Rooks don’t live I’ll not trouble your valuable time with the specifics of in Saerb alone.” The yokel’s turn toward ornithological interests my journey: the crass caravaneers, the fetid foods, the ram- baffled me, and I’ve seen no crows in the area of your soon-to- shackle flyspeck villages, the sanctimonious droning of my be-purchased bridge, but as a competent and attentive servant fellow passenger (a would-be devotee of the Saint), nor the I’m bound to report this detail. dark-eyed things that scampered and leaped in the shadows That brings a merry close to my report, your lordship. If, with of the surrounding woodlands, their sharp faces full of quiet all wisdom and haste, you might send an additional 270,673 menace whenever they appeared.
